name: ランサー
description: 人々が危機に瀕したとき、機械化された古のランサーたちが眠りから目覚める。どんな建物よりも高く、いかなる軍隊よりも強力なランサーたちは、その臣民たちを守ると、再び地下へと帰って行く。

skins.name: ダークランサー ブリッツクランク

wikiSkinData.lore: An ancient sentinel corrupted by mysterious black lightning, Rogue Lancer Blitzcrank mercilessly crushes provincial armies, destroying entire castles with kings still on their thrones. What caused its rampage is still uncertain, but for now it seems to be following its dread protocol to the letter.

skins.name: ライトランサー ブリッツクランク

wikiSkinData.lore: A silent protector of the masses, the artificial paladin Blitzcrank was aroused from the earth by a bolt of mysterious white lighting. It now serves all honorable subjects, defending with true and calculated precision.

skins.name: ランサーストラタス ウーコン

wikiSkinData.lore: Another of the ancient, mechanized Lancer units, Wukong arises from his dusty slumber in times of extreme danger, protecting the outland city-states from the most dire threats. Once these foes are eliminated he returns to the earth, an enigma older than recorded history.

skins.name: ランサーゼロ ヘカリム

wikiSkinData.lore: A mechanized sentinel called upon in times of war, Lancer Zero Hecarim is the protector of an ancient city—the last line of defense against the most fearsome opponents. Once unleashed, the damage it causes can be extraordinary, so it is always held back as a final, desperate gamble.
